entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need the option to disable XAML source gen, this is necessary for native embedding of .NET MAUI on WinUI 3 #14247
  • Microsoft.Maui.Media.mediapicker is asking permission 2 times only in android, iOS working fine #14244
    Backlog
  • CharacterSpacing Causes Button Layout to be Incorrect #14243
    Backlog
  • [android] Border's children disappear in dotnet/maui/main? #14239
    Backlog
  • ListView command hides cells' content #14234
  • CollectionView with vertical GridItemsLayout uses incorrect Span on Windows #14228
  • Maui Performance Issues #14227
    Backlog
  • CollectionView+FormattedString Poor Performance #14222

Closed

  • add documentation for taking VS-generated default Maui project nad debugging with local Maui build #6218
  • Label rendered differently when using <Span> and FontAttributes="Bold" #7341
  • Control event propagation? #7332
  • Improve template build with Arcade Templating MSBuild tasks #5101
  • DisplayAlert popup on multiple open windows #10026
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS only SocketException No route to host #14224
  • error NETSDK1139: The target platform identifier tizen was not recognized. #14206
  • Custom controls using handlers in MAUI app targetting .net7 not working #14213
  • XAML changes not automatically updating as expected #13566

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into net8.0 #14246
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Removal of the AppAction icon extension on Android #14235
  • [Android] Changes to propagate touch event with Frame #14230
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame

Merged

  • Fix firing modal from appearing ios14 #14240
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] Make sure that we have valid values for setting the ContentSize of the ScrollView on iOS #14242
  • [Windows] Display alerts by Window #14229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [net8.0] Update Tizen packages #14225
    platform/tizen
  • Add permissions to the rebase action #14238
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Create a Rebase PR bot #14237
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [android] update gradle from 7.0.2 to 7.2 #14221
  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 #14183
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • RadioButton Default Template Fill Theme Fix and new Theme Colors for Samples app #14117
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton

Updated

  • Add Pages VC View opposed to the handlers view #13510
  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Page/Shell #14006
    area/shell 🐢
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    area/platform
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [iOS] Update CollectionView layout when reloading data #14218
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14215
    area/templates 📄
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Code generation now supports internal duplicate types #14171
    area/Xaml </>
